title: Font used in the logo on this website, www.visitmexico.com?
content:
Beautiful font. I'm sure this was a mixture of upper and lower case, but anyone know what font this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019130650im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mexico-logo_newcrop_4664.jpg)

Thanks in advance!

-carrie
author: carriesn

comments.content: I don’t think it’s a font. The |e| doesn’t match the |c| in style.

maybe so. i was able to make a reasonable copy using Arial Black. However, the M has me stumped. If I could get a font that would give me a M similar to the logo above, I'd be happy. Any ideas?

Here's what I came up with using Arial Black...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019130650im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-06-21%20at%203_5820.55.54%20PM.png)

and yes i know the I is off, will fix that :)

I think this was made by Gabriel Martinez Meave, so you could ask him. In fact if he didn't make it he would still know about it.

hhp
